page.title: 02Factory work in Fraserburgh
page.content:
My dad works as an engineer at McRaes.There are many different shifts you can work and they are, two o'clock in the afternoon until ten o'clock at night or you can work six o'clock in the evening until six o'clock the next morning.It goes on like that.My dad works overnight and if anything goes wrong in the factory like a mechanical fault in one of the machines he repairs it. There is a place called the cold store in the factory where there are great big freezers which are on all the time.This helps keep the fish fresh until they reach the place where they are being sold.
Scott Buchan (13)
